title: 2022 GT Force Carbon runs high-pivot LTS suspension on 160mm 29er enduro bike
content:
The 2022 GT Force Carbon has arrived with the high-pivot linkage tuned suspension platform proven on the GT Fury DH Bike. Rolling on 29″ wheels only, the Force Carbon runs a 160mm travel rear end with a predominantly rearward axle path typical of high-pivot designs. We got a pre-launch peak at the new enduro rig […]
